titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of existing Revolutionary War fortifications and to prepare and publish a study of the life and career of Thaddeus Kosciuszko.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 5/10/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to: (1) conduct and report to the President and specified congressional committees on a study of existing Revolutionary War fortifications; and (2) prepare and publish a study of the life and career of Thaddeus Kosciuszko, a Revolutionary War hero. Authorizes appropriations.
